ComicInfo.Summary:
As a great were-beast terrorizes the town, Antoinette comes to grips with the fact that she's become a were-beast herself! What should she do? Luckily, Liza knows. Meanwhile, the gypsies are blamed for the were-beasts atrocities. Can Antoinette and Liza stop the ferocious were-beast and clear their family's name? Or will the gypsies be sentenced to death?
